greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of sqrt(2/3).
comment: Equals Sum_{n>=0} (-1)^n*binomial(2n,n)/8^n = 1/A115754. Averaging this constant with sqrt(2) = A002193 = Sum_{n>=0} binomial(2n,n)/8^n yields A145439.
Height (from a vertex to the opposite face) of regular tetrahedron with unit edge. - _Stanislav Sykora_, May 31 2012
reference: Jolley, Summation of Series, Dover (1961) eq. (168) on page 32.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
D. H. Lehmer, Interesting series involving the Central Binomial Coefficient, Am. Math. Monthly 92, no 7 (1985) 449-457.
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 04 2009
